Name: Tournament event competition
Description: This represents a specific competition of a sporting event at a particular tournament. For example, Men's 400m at 2009 Golden Gala. It represents the entire competition, rather than the heats, rounds, trials, etc. that comprise the competition.

Properties.Name: Event
Properties.Description: The event that this is a competition of.

Properties.Name: Tournament
Properties.Description: The multi-event sporting tournament at which this competition was held.
